name: Kaiju-Rakuen
description:
WARNING: The enemy AI is not working properly yet. Soon to be fixed!!!

Made for the Mini Jam 81. 

  • THEME: Kaiju.  
  • LIMITATION: Death isn't the end.
  • CONTROLS: Move with ASWD and Space-bar to attack.

Kaijuu-rakuen is a 1v1 game where you fight against different kaiju with different stats, each time you "die/lose" you can choose which kaiju you want to respawn next. So even after death you can continue fighting.

ASSETS:

  • penusbmic: https://penusbmic.itch.io/
  • 9e0: https://9e0.itch.io/
  • scut: https://scut.itch.io/7drl-tileset-2018
